title: Bandcamp update brings song and album queuing to the app
content:
Bandcamp, an online platform where fans can buy songs and support artists they like, released an update to its iOS and Android app this week to add an important new feature. With the update, users can finally queue up songs, and even entire albums, to play next.

more…

The post Bandcamp update brings song and album queuing to the app appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The latest version of Bandcamp's mobile app for iOS and Android now has a queue for songs and even entire albums.
